title: White Noise
description: Just when you think you have a handle on what is going on in this book, with a few flicks of her wrist Tanya Lisle twists what you know like a rubic’s cube.- The BookbubbleMax wants to run, but the woman in white finds him every time. After a normal day at school turns into the double homicide of his parents, Max finds himself in a strange place surrounded by stranger people. Harrison, a boy who can teleport, shows him the ropes and warns him not to stray too far away from the group. The people who killed his parents are after all of them. At first Max doesn’t believe him, but every time he tries to leave, the men in suits and a mysterious woman in white are there. He doesn’t know how they keep finding him, but something about this doesn’t feel right and he can’t sit by and wait for answers.
author: Tanya Lisle
